description: UCL Student Union Purchase Request Form. USE THIS ONLY IF YOU WANT THE UNION TO BUY SOMETHING FOR YOU (e.g. they pay the supplier directly). DO NOT use this for reimbursement (use Payment Request instead). Provide a breakdown of costs.

fields.name: club_society
fields.description: Club or Society Name (type to search, Enter to select)

fields.name: cost_items
fields.description: List of items being purchased. TIP: If multiple small items are from the same invoice, SUMMARIZE them into a single line item with the TOTAL cost to simplify the form.

fields.name: description
fields.description: Description of this item

fields.name: grant_type
fields.description: Grant or Non-grant expenditure (Default: Non-grant)

fields.name: expenditure_type
fields.description: Type of expenditure (Default: MISCELLANEOUS EXPENDITURE)

fields.name: cost
fields.description: Cost in GBP (e.g. 50.00)

fields.name: payment_method
fields.description: How should the purchase be made? (Default: UK Bank transfer)
fields.default: UK Bank transfer (e.g. to pay an invoice or pay by BACS)
options: UK Bank transfer (e.g. to pay an invoice or pay by BACS)
Payment over the phone (via credit card)
International bank transfer (e.g. to pay an invoice from overseas)

fields.name: phone_payment_details
fields.description: [ONLY FOR: Payment over the phone] Provide company name, phone number to call, and any reference numbers

fields.name: online_payment_links
fields.description: [ONLY FOR: Online payment] Provide exact website links to each product to purchase

fields.name: account_number
fields.description: [ONLY FOR: UK Bank transfer] 8-digit UK bank account number (no spaces)

fields.name: sort_code
fields.description: [ONLY FOR: UK Bank transfer] 6-digit sort code (no dashes or spaces, e.g. 010203)

fields.name: company_name
fields.description: [ONLY FOR: UK Bank transfer] Name of company being paid

fields.name: company_email
fields.description: [ONLY FOR: UK Bank transfer] Company's email address

fields.name: invoice_number
fields.description: [ONLY FOR: UK Bank transfer] Invoice number from the supplier

fields.name: invoice_file
fields.description: [ONLY FOR: UK Bank transfer] Path to invoice file (jpg, png, pdf, doc)

fields.name: international_confirm_fee
fields.description: [ONLY FOR: International transfer] Confirm fee coverage

fields.name: iban
fields.description: [ONLY FOR: International transfer] IBAN

fields.name: bic
fields.description: [ONLY FOR: International transfer] Bank Identifier Code (BIC/SWIFT)

fields.name: receiver_name
fields.description: [ONLY FOR: International transfer] Name of person/company receiving payment

fields.name: receiver_address
fields.description: [ONLY FOR: International transfer] Receiver's address line 1

fields.name: receiver_address2
fields.description: [ONLY FOR: International transfer] Receiver's address line 2 (optional)

fields.name: receiver_city
fields.description: [ONLY FOR: International transfer] Receiver's city/town

fields.name: receiver_state
fields.description: [ONLY FOR: International transfer] Receiver's state/province

fields.name: receiver_postcode
fields.description: [ONLY FOR: International transfer] Receiver's postal/ZIP code

fields.name: receiver_country
fields.description: [ONLY FOR: International transfer] Receiver's country

fields.name: bank_name
fields.description: [ONLY FOR: International transfer] Name of receiving bank

fields.name: bank_address
fields.description: [ONLY FOR: International transfer] Bank address line 1

fields.name: bank_city
fields.description: [ONLY FOR: International transfer] Bank city/town

fields.name: bank_country
fields.description: [ONLY FOR: International transfer] Bank country

fields.name: linked_to_event_budget
fields.description: Select 'No' for linked to event budget (default)

fields.name: clothing_or_kit
fields.description: Select 'No' for clothing/sports kit purchase (default)

fields.name: involves_coach
fields.description: Select 'No' for coach/instructor involvement (default)

fields.name: involves_speaker
fields.description: Select 'No' for external speaker involvement (default)

fields.name: has_contract
fields.description: Select 'No' for associated contract (default)
